Title: Bangladesh issues a second tender seeking one 2H October LNG cargo
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. (RPGCL) is seeking one cargo for delivery on Oct. 24-25 to either the Excelerate Energy-operated Moheshkhali or Summit LNG terminals on Moheshkhali Island in Chittagong. The tender closes on Sep. 28 and follows the close yesterday of an earlier tender for a delivery on Oct. 19-21.
Author: CK

Title: Freeport LNG ships first cargo, marking the plant’s restart
Description: The 154,500m3 LNG Alliance LNG tanker has departed from the 13.2 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Freeport LNG facility in Texas, marking the restart of production and loadings after Hurricane Nicholas’ landfall on Sep. 14 caused a cut in power supplies to and a shutdown of the plant.
Author: CK
